sentences.en: At present, womanhood, especially the adult women, is the main consumption part of cosmetics.
sentences.cn: 目前女性特别是成年女性是化妆品市场的消费主流.

sentences.en: Destiny is how you accept your womanhood and what you make of it.
sentences.cn: 而命运则意味着你如何接受你的女性身份以及你因此做了什么?

sentences.en: Here she is on the threshold of womanhood.
It is symbolic of the fighting spirit of modern womanhood.
sentences.cn: 它象征着现代妇女的战斗精神.

sentences.en: Nay , let the silence of my womanhood.
sentences.cn: 女性的爱凭她的贞静,而换来.

sentences.en: Pregnancy is a natural part of womanhood.
sentences.cn: 怀孕是女子成年期的一个自然部分。

sentences.en: She grew to womanhood, and gave her heart to one who could not know its worth.
sentences.cn: 她渐渐长大成人, 把她的心交给了一位不知道它的价值的人.

sentences.en: She was a little girl when I left home; now she buds into womanhood.
sentences.cn: 我离开家时她还是个小女孩, 现在已成年轻妇女了.

sentences.en: She was not beautiful and was obviously far beyond the first bloom of womanhood.
sentences.cn: 她不漂亮,而且很明显,早已经过了花季少女的年龄.

sentences.en: Stand proudly and exult in your womanhood. Remember: Woman hold up half the sky.
sentences.cn: 不卑不亢的生活着,并以身为女性而骄傲. 撑起半边天的就是你了.

sentences.en: The breast has always been a symbol of womanhood and ultimate fertility.
sentences.cn: 乳腺是女性性征和生育力的重要标志.

sentences.en: The years of puberty and early womanhood are difficult, even frightening, for many girls.
sentences.cn: 青春期的几年是困难的, 甚至对有的女孩来说是恐怖的.

sentences.en: The younger lady was in the lovely bloom and spring - time of womanhood.
sentences.cn: 那位小姐正处在女性含苞待放的青春妙龄.

sentences.en: Three years later the March girls had grown into young womanhood.
sentences.cn: 三年后,玛曲家的女孩们长成了年轻女子.

words.tran_cn: 女子气的；柔弱的；适于女子的
像女人的；有女子气质的
像女人地；适合于妇女地
玩弄女性者；沉溺于女色的人
女人；女人气质；女子成年期

trans.tran_cn: 女子成年期，女子特征，女子气质
